Hi {name},

I came across your profile and was really impressed by your work in {role} — especially your experience with [specific skill/project]. I'm a recruiter at {company}, and we're building out a team that I think you'd be a great fit for.

Would you be open to a quick, no-pressure chat to learn more? Happy to work around your schedule.

Best,
{cursor}

Subject: {role} at {company} — thought of you

Hi {name},

I found your profile through [source] and wanted to reach out directly. We're looking for a {role} to join our team at {company}, and your background in [area of expertise] stood out.

A few quick highlights:
- [Key selling point about the role]
- [Compensation/equity highlight]
- [Culture or growth detail]

Would you have 15 minutes this week for an intro call? Here's my calendar link: [link]

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

I know you might not be actively looking right now, and that's completely fine. I'm reaching out because your background in [area] is exactly what we're looking for on our {role} team at {company}.

Even if the timing isn't right, I'd love to connect and keep you in the loop for future opportunities. Sometimes the best moves happen when you're not expecting them.

Would you be open to a casual conversation?

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Thanks for your interest in the {role} position at {company}! I'd love to set up an interview.

Here are a few available times:
- {date} at [time]
- {date} at [time]
- {date} at [time]

The interview will be approximately [duration] with [interviewer name and title]. It will cover [brief description of focus areas].

Please let me know which time works best, or feel free to suggest an alternative. I'll send a calendar invite with all the details once we've confirmed.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Just confirming your interview for the {role} position:

- Date: {date}
- Time: [time] [timezone]
- Format: [Video call / In-person / Phone]
- Interviewer(s): [names and titles]
- Link/Location: [details]

To help you prepare:
- The interview will focus on [topics]
- Please have [any required materials] ready
- Plan for approximately [duration]

If anything comes up and you need to reschedule, just let me know — no worries at all. Good luck!

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Friendly reminder that your interview for the {role} position is coming up tomorrow, {date} at [time] [timezone].

Here's your meeting link: [link]

You'll be speaking with [interviewer name]. If you have any last-minute questions, feel free to reach out.

Looking forward to it!

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Thank you for taking the time to interview with us today for the {role} position. It was a pleasure getting to learn more about your experience, especially [specific topic discussed].

Our team will be reviewing feedback over the next [timeframe], and I'll be in touch with an update by {date}. In the meantime, if you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out.

Thanks again for your time!

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Great news — the team really enjoyed speaking with you, and we'd love to invite you to the next stage of our interview process for the {role} position.

This round will involve [description of next round — e.g., a technical assessment, panel interview, case study]. It typically takes about [duration].

Are any of these times available for you?
- {date} at [time]
- {date} at [time]
- {date} at [time]

Let me know what works, and I'll get everything set up.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

I'm thrilled to let you know that we'd like to extend an offer for the {role} position at {company}! The team was genuinely impressed throughout the process, and we believe you'd make a fantastic addition.

Here's a summary of the offer:
- Title: {role}
- Base Salary: [amount]
- Start Date: {date}
- [Equity/Bonus/Other]: [details]
- Benefits: [highlights]

I've attached the formal offer letter with full details. The offer is valid until {date}.

I'd love to hop on a quick call to walk through everything and answer any questions you may have. Would [time] on {date} work?

Congratulations, and welcome to the team!

{cursor}

Hi {name},

I wanted to check in and see if you've had a chance to review the offer for the {role} position. I know it's a big decision, and I want to make sure you have everything you need.

If you have any questions about compensation, benefits, team structure, or anything else, I'm happy to set up a call or connect you with the hiring manager.

No rush — just want to make sure you feel supported as you think things through.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Thank you so much for taking the time to interview for the {role} position at {company}. We genuinely enjoyed getting to know you and learning about your experience.

After careful consideration, we've decided to move forward with another candidate whose background more closely aligns with the specific needs of this role. This was not an easy decision — you clearly have a lot to offer.

I'd love to keep your information on file for future opportunities that may be a better fit. Would that be okay with you?

Wishing you all the best in your search, and please don't hesitate to reach out if our paths cross again.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Thank you for your interest in the {role} position at {company} and for taking the time to speak with me.

After reviewing your background against the current requirements for this role, we've decided not to move forward at this time. We're looking for someone with more depth in [specific area], but your experience in [positive note] was impressive.

I'll keep you in mind if something that's a stronger match opens up. I wish you the best in your job search.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Welcome to {company}! We're so excited to have you join us as our new {role} starting {date}.

Here's what to expect for your first day:
- Start time: [time] [timezone]
- Location/Login: [office address or remote setup instructions]
- Point of contact: [name and contact info]
- What to bring: [ID, laptop, etc.]

Before your start date, please complete the following:
- [ ] Sign and return your offer letter and employment documents
- [ ] Complete the onboarding form: [link]
- [ ] Set up your accounts: [instructions]

Your manager, [manager name], and the rest of the team can't wait to meet you. If you have any questions before day one, I'm just a message away.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

Hope your first [week/two weeks] at {company} has been going well! I wanted to check in and see how you're settling in.

A few things I'd love to hear about:
- How has the onboarding experience been so far?
- Do you have everything you need to do your best work?
- Is there anything I can help with or any feedback on the process?

Your success matters to us, so don't hesitate to share anything — big or small.

{cursor}

Hi {name},

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out because [candidate name] has listed you as a professional reference for a {role} position at {company}.

Would you be available for a brief 10-15 minute call this week? I'd love to hear about your experience working with them.

Here are a few times that work on my end:
- {date} at [time]
- {date} at [time]

Of course, all responses will be kept confidential. Please let me know what works best for you.

Thank you!

{cursor}

Reference Check — {role} Position
Candidate: [candidate name]
Reference: {name}
Date: {date}

1. How do you know [candidate name], and how long did you work together?
2. What was their role, and what were their primary responsibilities?
3. What would you say are their greatest strengths?
4. Can you share an area where they could improve or grow?
5. How did they handle pressure, deadlines, or conflict?
6. Would you work with them again if given the opportunity?
7. Is there anything else you think we should know?

Hi {name},

Thank you for letting me know about your decision. While we're disappointed we won't have the chance to work together right now, I completely understand and respect your choice.

You were a strong candidate throughout the process, and if your circumstances change in the future, we'd welcome the opportunity to reconnect. Our door is always open.

Wishing you all the best in your next chapter!
